segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to look at some watch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I show you the gold ones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the price for this one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's quite steep . Can you come down a little bit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not . The price is very moderate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's rather more than I was thinking of paying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We brought the price down only a few days ago . This is definitely a bargain .
segments.speaker: S1
